data.title: Susan Lucci and Erika Slezak To Join The All-Star Lineup For ABC Super Soap Weekends at DCA
data.meta_description: Susan Lucci and Erika Slezak To Join The All-Star Lineup For ABC Super Soap Weekends at DCA
data.text:
Susan Lucci and Erika Slezak To Join The All-Star Lineup For "ABC Super Soap Weekends" At Disney's California Adventure Park

Emmy Award-winning actresses Susan Lucci, of All My Children, and Erika Slezak, of One Life To Live, will join the list of Daytime stars appearing in ABC Super Soap Weekends at Disney's California Adventure this spring.

Lucci and Slezak are among the best-known and most enduring stars in all of Daytime drama. Lucci, who plays the beautiful, scheming Erika Kane, will appear during the first ABC Super Soap Weekend, dedicated to stars and fans of All My Children, on April 6 and 7. Slezak, who portrays courageous and troubled Victoria Lord Davidson, will appear with other stars of One Life to Live on April 13 and 14 at Disney's California Adventure.

A total of 60 stars representing all four ABC Daytime dramas will appear during ABC Super Soap Weekends at Disney's California Adventure. On April 6 and 7, Susan Lucci will join other All My Children stars, including Julia Barr (Brooke English), Rebecca Budig (Greenlee Smythe), John Callahan (Edmund Grey), David Canary (Adam/Stuart Chandler), Marj Dusay (Vanessa Cortlandt), Amelia Heinle (Mia Saunders), Elizabeth Hendrickson (Maggie Stone), Finola Hughes (Anna Devane), Vincent Irizarry (David Hayward), Terri Ivens (Simone Torres), Michael E. Knight (Tad Martin), Jill Larson (Opal Cortlandt), Cameron Mathison (Ryan Lavery), Alicia Minshew (Kendall Hart), J. Eddie Peck (Jake Martin), Eden Riegel (Bianca Montgomery), Jack Scalia (Chris Stamp) and Marcy Walker (Liza Chandler).

On April 13 and 14 Erika Slezak will appear with other One Life to Live stars, including Melissa Archer (Natalie Buchanan), Phil Carey (Asa Buchanan), Kamar de los Reyes (Antonio Vega), David Fumero (Cristian Vega), Catherine Hickland (Lindsay Rappaport), Fiona Hutchison (Gabrielle Medina Buchanan), Laurence Lau (Sam Rappaport), Nathaniel Marston (Al Holden), Jessica Morris (Jennifer Rappaport), Nathan Purdee (Hank Gannon), Brandon Routh (Seth Anderson), Sherri Saum (Keri Reynolds), Hillary B. Smith (Nora Buchanan), Timothy D. Stickney (RJ Gannon), Erin Torpey (Jessica Buchanan), Ty Treadway (Troy MacIver) and Robert S. Woods (Bo Buchanan).

General Hospital will be spotlighted on April 20 and 21, with appearances by such stars as Chad Brannon (Zander Smith), Tamara Braun (Carly Corinthos), Robin Christopher (Skye Quartermaine), Stuart Damon (Alan Quartermaine), Nancy Lee Grahn (Alexis Davis), Rebecca Herbst (Elizabeth Webber), John Ingle (Edward Quartermaine), Wally Kurth (Ned Ashton), Sarah Laine (Sarah Webber), Jaime Ray Newman (Kristina Cassadine), Marisa Ramirez (Gia Campbell), Coltin Scott (Nikolas Cassadine), Billy Warlock (A J Quartermaine), Alicia Leigh Willis (Courtney Matthews), Jacob Young (Lucky Spencer) and Jacklyn Zeman (Bobbie Spencer). The names of the cast members from Port Charles appearing over this same weekend will be announced at a later date due to a confidential breaking storyline.

Each of these weekends will offer guests the opportunity to meet their favorite stars throughout Disney's California Adventure while enjoying autograph sessions, game shows, celebrity interviews hosted by Linda Dano of One Life to Live, and a casting call full of exciting opportunities for lucky fans hosted by Walt Willey of All My Children. The elaborate celebrations will also offer one-of-a-kind memorabilia and surprise guest appearances at the ABC Soap Opera Bistro.

For guests who want to make these exclusive events a mini-vacation experience, ABC Super Soap Weekends packages are available. The package includes a one-night hotel stay, a Two-Day Passport for Disney's California Adventure, a special breakfast with the stars at ABC Soap Opera Bistro and an ABC Soap Opera commemorative gift. Disneyland Resort hotels include the Disneys Grand Californian Hotel®, the Disneyland Hotel and Disneys Paradise Piersm Hotel. For event information or reservations, call (800) 450-4002.

--Posted March 6, 2002
